com.phonegap.calendar.android.adapters
Class CalendarsManager

java.lang.Object
  com.phonegap.calendar.android.adapters.CalendarsManager

public class CalendarsManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the CalendarsManager object that get an instance of the google CalendarClient and give us the possibility of having a list of user's calendars, add a new calendar, modify or delete.

Author:
Sergio Martinez Rodriguez

Constructor Summary
CalendarsManager(android.content.Context context)
          Builder that gets an instance of the google ClientCalendar with access into the user's google account calendar
